short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that changes the title!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that just changes the titles. When the popup shows up, just type whatever you want, and the title will be set. A personal project that helps me identifying what the tab has in its content.
